div.head: 體重
div.div: the body feels heavy the body is heavy

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the body feels heavy the body is heavy

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with shen zhong 身重 . Su wen 素問 5: 年五十，體重，耳目不聰明 矣 , “At the age of fifty, the body feels heavy ; the ears and the eyes are no longer clear”.

②Physical feature of pharmaceutical substances, referring to drugs with a compact and large mass. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry tao hua shi 桃花石：其色似桃花，光潤而體 重，以舐之不著舌者為佳 , “Its color is reminiscent of that of peach blossoms; it has luster and the body is heavy . Those that do not stick to one’s tongue when licked are best”.
